examples:
I was signed up by someone else by accident. There is no way to unsubscribe and your link to contact support doesn’t include a way to contact you. Please remove me from all your mailing lists and never contact me again. 


Begin forwarded message:

From: Canva <EMAIL>
Date: January 7, 2021 at 8:56:01 PM EST
To: <EMAIL>
Subject: You have been invited to join a team on Canva

﻿ 	 		You have been invited to join a team on Canva 		 		 		 		 		 		 	 		 		 		 		 		 	 	<NAME> Franklin has invited you to join <NAME> Franklin′s team on Canva. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

 

 

You're invited to <NAME> Franklin′s team

<NAME> Franklin has invited you to join <NAME> Franklin′s team on Canva.

  

  Accept Invitation (<URL>   

  New to Canva? You can create beautiful graphics and documents in minutes, even if you don’t have design experience.
Joining a team on Canva makes designing together super easy.  

 

 
 
You received this email because <NAME> Franklin has invited you to be a Member on their team. If this was sent to you by mistake, please contact support (<URL> .
 

Made for you with from Canva
Canva®, <TAGLINE>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: why do I have to invite the same person again and again
What kind of problem ?: Otherwise describe your problem: how i can invite my 5 users
What do you need help with ?: I have been invited to a team but unfortunately I always get an error message

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello! I was invited to join a team by an individual I do not know. I was advised to contact support if the invitation email was sent to me in error, and I believe it was.

Thank you.
What do you need help with?: After I invited someone to my team, I can't send them any of my canvas work again

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have a pro account and I invited my mom who works with me to join my team.  It appears she made a mistake and started her own account and then invited me instead. Are you able to correct please. <EMAIL> and <EMAIL>
What do you need help with?: Hello, I'm trying out your team 30 day free trial but my team are not receiving their invites... Why would this be?

What kind of problem are you reporting ?: Other Describe the problem: If I buy an account in version 1 + 4, will the people I invite see my content? How to invite them? Can these 4 invited people already have an account?

What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: Hello the team I am contacting you for information please. If I invite 4 people to join my team, will they also have 4 pro Canva accounts with all the benefits? If you have any advices and suggestions I accept them with pleasure. A big thank-you. Stephane De Sousa

What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: Hello the team I am contacting you for information please. If I invite 4 people to join my team, will they also have 4 pro Canva accounts with all the benefits? If you have any advices and suggestions I accept them with pleasure. A big thank-you. Stephane De Sousa

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: my team does not receive there invitations on emails
What do you need help with ?: A colleague is inviting me to join his team, I get the invitation, I accept, but then I get a message saying that I don't have access ...
What do you need help with?: I can't see who I invited to be on my team, and if they didn't accept, I want to invite other people

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I invited another account to my team but he can't use my 'pro' service along with me. What is wrong with that?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Accepted team invitation but the team is not showing up for me to use.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have sen a few invites to team members, but no-one have received the invites.

What do you need help with?: I have invited three people to join my team, but it seems as if they have not received the invites yet.  Is there something else I need to do?  All the email addresses are correct.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Why are there now 3 teams? I have invited someone three times and now it appears I have three teams and they are not in any of them.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hey! I got invited to a team, but the invite link is broken. Is there any way I can see what has happened?
What issue are you having ?: I want to invite people from my team to Canva
What problem are you having?: I receive an invitation to be part of a team but I have an error message

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have a Pro Account and I'm trying to add someone to our team.  She gets the invite, but every time she uses the link, it says she has no access?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My invitations are not what I approved.

Describe your issue: the person I'm inviting clicks on accept invite then receives the message "looks like you don't have access. why are they receiving this?

What kind of problem?: Other

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have started a team with my account and havent invited anyone yet.now i want to cancle the team but cant figure out how

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have invited a member from my team to get access to my account. When he clicks on  the invitation mail link, it tells him that he does not have access. 
Please help sort this out.
What do you need help with?: how comes people who already have an account and are using the free subscription cannot be invited as your team?

What kind of problem?: Sharing

Describe your issue: Hi I am a little confused.
I don't understand the relation between me and my team. What do I pay for? Who can I invite in to the team? How do I invite them?
Will they see my work? 
-----
I need to create an area where to work with one person. 
I need to have my usual area for myself.
I need to pay only 1 pro !
--- I need not to say ALL other teams I've created by mistake.

please help me :)
I need a lot of help!
<NAME>
What type of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Good evening, I created a team but when people receive the invitation, they are told that they do not have the authorization. Can you help me?
What do you need help with?: I can't find where my team's emails are. One of my team has not received an invite, so I don't know if I accidentally typed it in wrong. please advise.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: a team member created an account- and invited me to join. the invite expired and now I can not access her work (she left the job) how do i get in?
What problem are you having?: I am invited to a pro canvas account but do not see the team

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: started canva pro. Invited one person to my team, can each memeber of my team access the pra account?
What do you need help with?: i invited someone, it says they are apart of my team on my end, but not on theirs.
What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: Where do you have to go to see the invitations to be a member of a team?

What kind of problem?: Egyéb

Írd körül a problémát: Hi Canva, I have a problem with accepting the invitation of <NAME> (csiszar.andrea) to join her group. Please help me! I already tried to accept it from Chrome/Edge/Mobile phone/incognito and doesn't work! Waiting for your answer! Have a good day!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I accepted a team invitation to the same email I use for my personal Canva and lost all previous work.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: We are trying to approve our teams invites to the canva pro team but its saying they have expired?
What kind of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: Invitation to a team member does not go through
What do you need help with ?: I was invited to a pro team, I accepted and the pro's functions don't work, my team doesn't show up and neither does the brand material
